snippet: Mardy Fish and Tommy Haas will meet in the Citi Open semifinals Saturday in Washington, their first matchup since 2007.
abstract: American tennis players Mardy Fish and Tommy Haas will meet in the Citi Open semifinals in Washington, their first matchup since 2007.
lead_paragraph: Mardy Fish and Tommy Haas will meet in the Citi Open semifinals Saturday in Washington, their first matchup since 2007.

headline.main: Fish and Haas Advance to Semifinals
headline.print_headline: Fish and Haas Advance to Semifinals
